FROM gcr.io/oss-fuzz-base/base-builder
MAINTAINER even.rouault@spatialys.com
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y make autoconf automake libtool g++ && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/OSGeo/proj.4 proj.4
WORKDIR proj.4
COPY build.sh $SRC/
